flags.clearTerminal: Clears the terminal before running the command.
flags.json: Outputs the result of the command as json string.

build.description: Builds the Flex plugin and creates a JavaScript and sourcemap bundle.

start.description: Starts a dev-server to build the Flex plugin locally.

flags.name: The name of the plugin you would like to run. You can provide multiple to run them all concurrently in the dev-environment (in Pilot).
flags.includeRemote: Use this flag to include all remote plugins in your build (in Pilot).

deploy.description: Builds and deploys a new version of the Flex plugin to your Flex application.

flags.patch: Publishes the version as a patch (SemVer); this is the default.
flags.minor: Publishes the version as a minor (SemVer).
flags.major: Publishes the version as a major (SemVer).
flags.public: Publishes the plugin as a public Twilio Asset; default is private.
flags.changelog: The changes (added/removed) made in this plugin version.
flags.description: The description of this Flex plugin.

flags.new: Creates a new Flex Plugin Configuration, otherwise will append to existing active Configuration.
flags.name: The friendly name of the Flex Plugin Configuration.
flags.enablePlugin: The plugin to enable, formatted as pluginName@version. You may use pluginName@latest as a shortcut for enabling the latest version of the plugin. Use additional --enable-plugin to provide other plugins to enable.
flags.disablePlugin: The plugin to disable, formatted as pluginName. Use additional --disable-plugin to provide other plugins to disable.
flags.description: The description of this Flex Plugin Configuration

defaults.description: The description of this Flex Plugin Configuration.

release.description: Creates a Flex Plugin Release. Enables the plugins (passed as params or via the Flex Configuration) on your Flex application.

flags.configurationSid: The Flex Plugin Configuration SID to release; other options are not required when using this option.

diff.description: Finds the diff between two Flex Plugin Configurations.

args.id1: The first Flex Plugin Configuration SID.
args.id2: The second Flex Plugin Configuration SID.

describeConfiguration.description: Provides details of the Flex Plugin Configuration like status, description and its associated Plugins.

describePlugin.description: Provides details of the Flex Plugin like status, description and its Flex Plugin Versions.

flags.name: The name of the Flex Plugin to describe.

describePluginVersion.description: Provides details of the Flex Plugin Version like changelog, status and the url of the plugin package.

flags.name: The Flex Plugin name of the Plugin Version to describe.
flags.version: The Flex Plugin Version to describe.

describeRelease.description: Provides details of the Flex Plugin Release like the underlying Plugin Configuration and Plugins.

flags.sid: The Flex Plugin Release SID to describe.
flags.active: The most recent release to describe.

listConfigurations.description: Lists the Flex Plugin Configuration on the account.

listPluginVersions.description: Lists the Flex Plugin Versions on the account.

flags.name: The plugin name to list its versions.

listPlugins.description: Lists the Flex Plugins on the account.

listReleases.description: Lists the Flex Releases on the account.

upgradePlugin.description: Upgrades your plugin to use the latest version of the Plugin CLI.

flags.install: If set, will install the dependencies.
flags.beta: If set, will upgrade to the latest beta version.
flags.yes: If set, will answer yes to all prompts.
flags.removeLegacyPlugin: Deletes legacy plugin bundle hosted on Twilio Assets (deployed via plugin builder v3).
